title: Making Pizza
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 93 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 220L
description: How do you make a pizza? A girl and her mom show the ingredients and sequence needed to make a yummy pizza. At the end of the story, the girl enjoys the pepperoni pizza she and her mom made. Photographs and high-frequency words support early readers.
reviewWords: cheese, flat, high, oven, pepperoni, pizza, round, sauce, spread, toss
awareness: Consonant Digraph Sounds                : Discriminate consonant digraph /ch/ sound
grammar: Exclamation Marks                : Recognize and understand the use of exclamation marks at the end of sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word too
